name: Med En Gong Eg Nr Bnn

content.text:
Med en gong eg når bånn 

Intro: [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]Am[/ch]  [ch]Dm[/ch]  [ch]Dsus2[/ch]  [ch]Gm[/ch] [ch]Gm7[/ch]  [ch]C7[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]C7[/ch] 

[ch]F[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch] 
Så du seier, darling vind 
[ch]Dm[/ch]               [ch]Dsus2[/ch] 
Blås i seilet og los meg inn 
     [ch]Gm[/ch]         [ch]Gm7[/ch]     [ch]C7[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]C7[/ch] 
Eg er framme med en gong eg når bånn 

[ch]F[/ch]                          [ch]Am[/ch] 
Eg er langt frå kysten når bølgene slår 
[ch]Dm[/ch]                         [ch]Dsus2[/ch] 
Min sang er runsten og min hals er sår 
     [ch]Gm[/ch]         [ch]Gm7[/ch]     [ch]C7[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]F7[/ch] 
Eg er framme med en gong eg når bånn 

[ch]Gm[/ch]     [ch]Gm7[/ch]          Csus7   [ch]C7[/ch]     
Vær så snill og fly heim en beskjed 
  [ch]F[/ch]         [ch]Fmaj7[/ch]          [ch]Cdim[/ch] 
og lov meg å fortell han uansett hva som skjer 
         [ch]Gm7[/ch]           
Sei eg er glad her på mitt hav 
   [ch]B[/ch]                 
men vett ikkje kor eg har blitt av 
      [ch]F[/ch]          [ch]Fmaj7[/ch] 
Sei eg synger min sang 
      [ch]Cdim[/ch] 
Holder pusten under vann 
      [ch]Gm[/ch]           [ch]Gm7[/ch]   
Sei eg sank, men er framme 
     Csus7 [ch]C7[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]C7[/ch] 
med en gong eg når bånn 

Og om du flyr på ei med langt krøllete hår 
som slår pusten ut av deg når hu går 
sei hu er i min sang når eg synker til bånns 

[ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]A[/ch] 
Fint om du husker å ta posten inn 
      [ch]B[/ch]                      [ch]F[/ch] 
og det einaste eg eige har eg gjort til din 
          [ch]Gm[/ch]          [ch]Gm7[/ch]         Csus7  [ch]C7[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch] 
og det er denne sangen her, som eg synge på vei til bånns.

Fearless BND - Higher 
Key of E 

[Intro] 

[ch]C#m[/ch] [ch]G#m[/ch] [ch]B[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch]


[Verse 1] 

            [ch]C#m[/ch]
Jesus your name
               [ch]E[/ch]
Is more than a name
               [ch]A[/ch]
It’s giving me hope
                 [ch]F#m[/ch]
It’s giving me life
             [ch]C#m[/ch]           [ch]E[/ch]
Jesus your name be lifted high
             [ch]A[/ch]            [ch]F#m[/ch]
No other name but Jesus saves 


[Chorus]

       [ch]C#m[/ch]          [ch]D#[/ch]  [ch]E[/ch]
Your name is higher, is higher
[ch]F#[/ch]     [ch]C#m[/ch]       [ch]D#[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch]
Your name is high above all
[ch]F#m[/ch]     [ch]G#m[/ch]        [ch]F#m[/ch]
Your love is greater, is greater
      [ch]C#m[/ch]               [ch]D#[/ch]  [ch]E[/ch]
Your name has conquered it all


[Verse 2] 

           [ch]C#m[/ch]
Jesus your life
              [ch]E[/ch]
Poured out for all
              [ch]A[/ch]
Ransomed my heart
               [ch]F#m[/ch] 
And rescued my soul
            [ch]C#m[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]
King over all coming again
                  [ch]A[/ch]
Death could not hold you
             [ch]F#m[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]
Forever you reign.. You reign


[Bridge] 

[ch]C#m[/ch]                       [ch]D#[/ch]  
Nails couldn’t keep you down
[ch]E[/ch]                           [ch]F#[/ch]
The grave couldn’t keep you in
[ch]C#m[/ch]                   [ch]D#[/ch]
Hell couldn’t keep you out
[ch]E[/ch]                  [ch]F#m[/ch] 
You reign, You reign

name: Fearless
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
[Intro]
[ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]A[/ch]  [ch]C#m[/ch]  [ch]B[/ch] (2x)

[Verse 1]
[ch]F#m[/ch]                            [ch]A[/ch]
 You've made me new and you've shown me how
[ch]C#m[/ch]             [ch]B[/ch]
 To live my life with no limits now
[ch]F#m[/ch]                 [ch]A[/ch]
 Adventure waits so I will go
[ch]C#m[/ch]          [ch]B[/ch]
 Lead me and I will follow


[Pre-Chorus]
[ch]F#m[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch]
 Love has lifted me
        [ch]C#m[/ch]
Driving out my fear
        [ch]B[/ch]
Healing all my hurt
[ch]F#m[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]
 Lord, let me see Your face
           [ch]C#m[/ch]
I know you took my place
           [ch]B[/ch]
So I could know my worth


[Chorus]
[ch]F#m[/ch]      [ch]A[/ch]             [ch]C#m[/ch]
 Lead us in your victory
              [ch]B[/ch]
We'll rise to live in your freedom
[ch]F#m[/ch]      [ch]A[/ch]             [ch]C#m[/ch]
 Now our past is history
              [ch]B[/ch]
So we can live FEARLESS


[Interlude]
[ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] [ch]C#m[/ch] [ch]B[/ch]
          We are fearless
[ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] [ch]C#m[/ch] [ch]B[/ch]
          Living for Jesus


[Instrumental]
[ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]A[/ch]  [ch]C#m[/ch]  [ch]B[/ch]

[ch]F#m[/ch]                     [ch]A[/ch]
 Through every storm, I won't let go
[ch]C#m[/ch]          [ch]B[/ch]
 Lead me and I will follow


[Pre-Chorus]
[ch]F#m[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch]
 Love has lifted me
        [ch]C#m[/ch]
Driving out my fear
        [ch]B[/ch]
Healing all my hurt

           [ch]B[/ch]

[Chorus]

 Lead us in your victory
              [ch]B[/ch]
We'll rise to live in your freedom
[ch]F#m[/ch]      [ch]A[/ch]             [ch]C#m[/ch]
 Now our past is history
              [ch]B[/ch]
So we can live FEARLESS


[Interlude]
[ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] [ch]C#m[/ch] [ch]B[/ch]
          We are fearless
[ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] [ch]C#m[/ch] [ch]B[/ch]
          Living for Jesus


[Bridge]
[ch]F#m[/ch]              [ch]A[/ch]
 We are, we are, we are fearless
[ch]C#m[/ch]                [ch]B[/ch]
 We're living for, living for Jesus

[ch]F#m[/ch]              [ch]A[/ch]
 We are, we are, we are fearless
[ch]C#m[/ch]                [ch]B[/ch]
 We're living for, living for Jesus

 Lead us in your victory

We'll rise to live in your freedom

              [ch]B[/ch]
